          <title>
            <string language="it">Triangoli</string>
            <string language="en">Triangles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreiecke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Triangles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Triângulos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίγωνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Triángulos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Sposta gli angoli del triangolo e osserva come cambiano le proprietà dei triangoli.</string>
            <string language="en">Move the corners of the triangle and observe how the triangles properties change.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">triangoli</string>
            <string language="en">triangles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verschieben Sie die Ecken des Dreiecks und 
beobachten Sie, wie die Dreieckeigenschaften ändern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déplacez les coins de la triangle et observez 
comment les propriétés de triangles changent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mova os cantos do triângulo e observe como as 
propriedades dos triângulos mudam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κινήστε τις γωνίες του τριγώνου και παρατηρήστε πώς 
οι ιδιότητες τριγώνων αλλάζουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mueva las esquinas del triángulo y observe cómo
las características de los triángulos cambian.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreiecke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triangles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">τρίγωνα</string>

          <keyword>
